snippet: Both sides call the talks slow and difficult, and say that gaps remain on the size of enrichment capability Iran would be permitted.
abstract: Latest round of nuclear talks between Iran and six world powers ends with Iranian and American officials saying progress was slow and difficult; serious gaps remain between two sides on basic issues like size of any nuclear enrichment capability Iran would be permitted to retain.
lead_paragraph: Both sides call the talks slow and difficult, and say that gaps remain on the size of enrichment capability Iran would be permitted.

headline.main: Nuclear Talks With Iran Fail to Yield Pact, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Talks With Iran Fail to Yield Pact, Officials Say
